rev.comment: Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/202.159.248.243|202.159.248.243]] to last version by 67.172.64.156
Although it has its rock and roll roots (which are covered later in the article), metal is its own genre.

Removed like to "True metal". The article linked refers to elemental metals, not music. There should be a new article titled "True metal music" to describe this subgenre.
